title: Third Party apps not working with Wifi
content:
I keep reading of the issue of third party apps not working over wifi and I only see workarounds of modifying the wifi MTU to make it work but I have not seen any indication that google is making a software fix for the phone. It will be good to know if google has acknowledge the issue and if a fix is in the works.
In my case I do not have access to my wifi access point and cant make any changes to it. I know its a pixel 3 issue as I have 3 other phones and apps such as Amazon and Twitter work fine on those phones but in both of my pixel 3 they do not work.

To recap: The issue is that while I'm connected to my home wifi (also happened on a friend wifi) apps like Amazon or Twitter do not work. They act as if there was no internet.
